description.english: Beat the boss level in Forest.
description.french: Bats le niveau du boss dans la Forêt.

description.schinese: 完成“森林”的 Boss 关卡。

description.brazilian: Passa o nível do boss na Floresta.

displayName.portuguese: Tu és o Mineiro mais Fino
displayName.brazilian: Tu és o Mineiro mais Fino

description.english: Beat the boss level in Mines.

description.russian: Сразитесь с главарем в копях.

description.schinese: 完成“矿山”的 Boss 关卡。

description.brazilian: Passa o nível do boss nas Minas.

description.english: Beat the end boss level and win the game!
description.french: Bats le niveau final du boss et gagne le jeu !
description.german: Besiege den Endgegner im Endlevel und gewinne das Spiel!
description.italian: Sconfiggi il boss finale e completa il gioco!
description.russian: Победите главаря на последнем уровне и выиграйте игру!
description.spanish: ¡Bate y termina el nivel jefe y gana el juego!
description.schinese: 完成最终 Boss 关卡并赢得游戏的胜利！
description.japanese: 最終レベルのボスを破り、ゲームに勝て！
description.portuguese: Passa o novel do boss final e ganha o jogo!
description.brazilian: Passa o novel do boss final e ganha o jogo!

description.english: Unlock and complete all the secret levels.
description.french: Déverrouille et termine tous les niveaux secrets.
description.german: Spiele alle Geheimlevel frei und durch.
description.italian: Sblocca e completa tutti i livelli segreti.

description.spanish: Desbloquea y completa todos los niveles secretos.
description.schinese: 解锁并完成所有秘密关卡。
description.japanese: 全ての秘密レベルをアンロックし、制覇せよ。
description.portuguese: Desbloqueia e complete todos os níveis secretos.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueia e complete todos os níveis secretos.

description.english: Find and collect one sapling in any level.
description.french: Trouve et récupère une jeune pousse à n’importe quel niveau.
description.german: Finde und sammle ein Bäumchen in jedem Level.
description.italian: Trova e raccogli un alberello in ogni livello.
description.koreana: 모든 단계에서 한개의 묘목을 찾아 수집하기
description.russian: Найдите на любом уровне один саженец.

description.brazilian: Procura e colecciona um rebento em qualquer nível.
